Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Polyaratos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0197.03
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (224)
